mil7.8.6:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘bhojanassa tini angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani tini angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.8.6:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sabbasattanam maggupatthambhena bhavitabbam.
mil7.8.6:1.4: Idam, maharaja, bhojanassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.8.6:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, bhojanam sabbasattanam balam vaddheti;
mil7.8.6:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena punnavaddhiya vaddhitabbam.
mil7.8.6:2.3: Idam, maharaja, bhojanassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.8.6:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, bhojanam sabbasattanam abhipatthitam;
mil7.8.6:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sabbalokabhipatthitena bhavitabbam.
mil7.8.6:3.3: Idam, maharaja, bhojanassa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
